**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Contract Title**
------------------

Site Design for CBO GBU3 Site Remedial Measures

**Solicitation Number**
-----------------------

WS4356150656

**Publication Date**
---------------------

2023-12-19

**Tender Closing Date**
-------------------------

2024-01-16T14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

**Description**
---------------

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Directorate of Cape Breton Operations (CBO) invites qualified consultants to provide geotechnical engineering services for the design of remedial measures required at the CBO GBU3 site, which is at risk from coastal erosion. The site is located at Connaught Avenue / McIntyre Lane in Glace Bay, Cape Breton Regional Municipality, Nova Scotia.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The scope of work includes the design of remedial measures to mitigate the effects of coastal erosion on the site. The consultant will be required to conduct site investigations, analyze the geotechnical conditions, and develop a design for the remedial measures.

**Contracting Authority**
-------------------------

The Contracting Authority is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), represented by the Directorate of Cape Breton Operations (CBO).

**Invited Firms**
----------------

The following firms have been invited to participate in this Request for Proposal:

* CBCL Ltd

* Mitchelmore Engineering Company Ltd
* WSP Canada Inc
* EXP Services Inc
* Harbourside Geotechnical Consultants
* Hatch Ltd
* GEMTEC
* Roy Consultants
* Stantec Consulting
* BGC Engineering Inc
* DesignPoint Engineering & Surveying Ltd
* Englobe Corp

**Request for Debrief**
----------------------

Bidders who are unsuccessful may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. The debriefing request should be made to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days of receiving notification of the unsuccessful bid.
